text: BOH tsytuye tomu shcho pryklady tsykh khto disbelieved druzhyna Noah ta druzhyna Doli. Vony buly odruzhenyy do dvokh z nashykh spravedlyvykh sluzhbovtsiv, ale vony vydaly yikh ta, otzhe, vony ne mohly dopomohty yim zovsim proty BOHA. Dva z nykh buv kazanyy, "Vnosyatʹ Peklo-Vohonʹ z tsymy khto zasluzhyly tse
